name: Bootstrap Confirm Popup
tagline: The Jquery/Bootstrap plugin that reduce developer's code & work. (additional benifits for asp.net MVC)
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Just arrived to Github.

**# What is Bootstrap Confirm ?**
The Bootstrap Confirm popup is set of reusable element made of twitter bootstap & jquery. Whenever you found responsive & 
reusable javascript confirm, you can use this plugin. It has all you need for any confirmation action like title , content , callback events etc. 

**# How to use ?**
`$(":submit").BootConfirm();`

 
### Authors and Contributors
The Author is @thankikaushik (Kaushik Thanki) and ask me for any further extended functionality you requires (Bug tracker as well). 
 
### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Plugin? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
